subject: Baseball
Doping (Sports)
lead_paragraph: The federal judge overseeing the defamation lawsuit brought by Roger Clemens against his former trainer Brian McNamee ordered McNamee’s lawyers to produce evidence that McNamee’s statements about Clemens’s use of performance-enhancing drugs were made in connection with a federal investigation, according to a court filing.
